name: 76 Degrees East
description:
76Degrees East Technologies is Product engineering and Software Services Company specialized in end-to-end mobility, custom application development, system integration & cloud solutions to enterprises worldwide. Equipped with a team of experts in consulting, mobile engineering, enterprise system integration & cloud engineering we can cater to the end to end IT needs of a startup and Enterprise.
We offer a range of services including mobility, Digital strategy, Cloud engineering and web Application development. We are an agile team of creative people with a unique blend of technology, imagination and innovativeness at its core. Our partnering approach with clients has proven to be a win-win. We are personally invested in your projects success - that is how great reputations are formed and that is what 76DE is built upon.
READ MORE...
